prompt.content: Using Uber Technologies’ (NYSE: UBER) Q1–Q4 2024 earnings releases, determine whether Uber’s 2024 quarterly Adjusted EBITDA results beat or missed management’s midpoint guidance. Express each quarter as “Q[X] 2024: BEAT (X.X%)” or “MISS (X.X%).” Use guidance provided in each prior quarter’s release. Round to 2 decimals.

messages.content: [{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Use Q4 2023 earnings press release to find Q1 2024 EBITDA guidance range to be 1.26-1.34B."},{"criteria":"Identify Q1 2024 midpoint EBITDA guidance to be (1.26 + 1.34) / 2 = $1.30B","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Look in Q1 2024 Earnings report and find that Q1 2024 actual adjusted EBITDA is $1382M","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Compare Q1 2024 midpoint EBITDA guidance to the actual adjusted EBITDA and conclude that Uber BEAT guidance by 1,382−1,300)/1,300 = 6.31%: Q1 2024: BEAT (6.31%)"},{"criteria":"Use Q1 2024 earnings press release to find Q2 2024 EBITDA guidance range to be 1.45-1.53B.","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Identify Q2 2024 midpoint EBITDA guidance to be (1.45 + 1.53) / 2 = $1.49B","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Look in Q2 2024 Earnings report and find that Q2 2024 actual adjusted EBITDA is $1570M"},{"criteria":"Compare Q2 2024 midpoint EBITDA guidance to the actual adjusted EBITDA and conclude that Uber BEAT guidance by (1,570−1,490)/1,490 = 5.37%: Q2 2024: BEAT (5.37%).\n","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Use Q2 2024 earnings press release to find Q3 2024 EBITDA guidance range to be 1.58-1.68B."},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Identify Q3 2024 midpoint EBITDA guidance to be (1.58 + 1.68) / 2 = $1.63B"},{"criteria":"Look in Q3 2024 Earnings report and find that BEAT guidance by (1,690−1,630)/1,630 = 3.68%: Q3 2024: BEAT (3.68%)."},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Use Q3 2024 earnings press release to find Q4 2024 EBITDA guidance range to be 1.78-1.88B."},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Identify Q4 2024 midpoint EBITDA guidance to be (1.78 + 1.88) / 2 = $1.83B"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Look in Q4 2024 Earnings report
